div1.p: IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT, IN AND FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON, SOUTHERN DIVISION.
Ex Parte In the Matter of Leroy Smith for Writ of Habeas Corpus 3445 ORDER
Upon the reading of the verified petition of the above named petitioner, and upon the reading of the affidavit hereunto annexed, and good cause appearing therefor,
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED, ADJUDGED AND DECREED:
1. That the Petitioner may appear andprosecute this action in forma pauperis.
2. That the necessary fees and costs of court be paid by the Government.
3. That the petitioner may file a typewritten petition and brief in support thereof.
IN THE Superior Court U.S. DIST. COURT, WESTERN DIST. SOUTHERN DIVISION.
Ex Parte In the Matter of Lerory Smith for Writ of Habeas Corpus.
FILED IN THE U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington, Northern Division OCT 16 1916 FRANK L. CROSBY, Clerk, By Ed M Lakin, Deputy
BEELER & SULLIVAN Layers 510-11 White Building, Seattle, Wash. Main 907.
